content.en: Sports analytics: Researchers are exploring how data mining algorithms and computer technology can be used to improve sports performance management, evaluate athletes' abilities, and analyze sports training. They are also investigating the role of artificial intelligence and machine learning in sports research and prediction. By applying big data analysis techniques and using algorithms, such as neural networks and association rules, researchers aim to enhance sports predictions and develop intelligent sport management systems.
content.da: Sportsanalyse: Forskere undersøger, hvordan data mining-algoritmer og computerteknologi kan bruges til at forbedre sports performance management, evaluere atleters evner og analysere sportstræning. De undersøger også rollen af kunstig intelligens og maskinlæring i sportsforskning og -forudsigelse. Ved at anvende big data-analyseteknikker og bruge algoritmer, såsom neurale netværk og associationsregler, sigter forskerne mod at forbedre sportsforudsigelser og udvikle intelligente sportsstyringssystemer.
